thread.title: Belize Wants to Reward One Struggling NFL Kicker
thread.title_full: Belize Wants to Reward One Struggling NFL Kicker

author: Belize Hub
title: Belize Wants to Reward One Struggling NFL Kicker
text:
About Belize , Belize News | October 9, 2015 by Belize Hub + | 0 Comments 
NFL kickers have become easy targets for criticism of late, but the Belize Tourism Board wants to reward one of them with a special invite to Central America. 
Kickers across the league missed a combined 18 field goals in Week 4, inspiring Belize tourism officials to come up with a unique promotion. According to the tourism board, the next NFL kicker to miss a field goal or extra point will receive a free trip to Belize.
